title: May Wrap Up and June TBR
content: I cannot believe it’s time for my June TBR post. I am in serious denial this month as my baby is turning ONE in June. How did this happen?!? Life is too fast! May was a solid reading month for me. I finished 4 books. I also reviewed 4 books. A Wrinkle in Time by Madeleine L’Engle The Crossover by Kwame Alexander The Graveyard Book by Neil Gaiman March by Geraldine Brooks I started several books… And made great strides in a few I’ve been reading for a bit… June goals are as wide and big as ever! Reach 75% of Little Dorrit (I read all the way to 50% in May! And I’m loving it!) Read at least 50% of Emma. I’ve been listening to it this reread and loving it. Austen is a truly talented writer–in all of her novels and writings. Planning to finish… Planning to start (and hopefully finish)… What are you reading this month?
